channel.title: Help with static IP Please?
channel.description: Well, you see, I have a wireless connection and my internet randomly goes down ever 6 hours or so? And I need to reset my internet connection to fix it which means I need to unplug my modem and router then plug them back in, and my IP is Changed So I need to portforward all over again! and I want to setup a static IP, So can anyone Help me find my DNS Servers? Because when I type in ipconfig on the Command Prompt, it wont show them =/

item.title: Help with static IP Please?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

mod terbo1:

well actually u do have cilent java just click on cilent and it says the type and its java lol now Ctrl F and type welcoem and stuf

This has nothing to do with anything he just said

Ontopic:
http://portforward.com/networking/staticip.htm

Read full topic

Well, you see, I have a wireless connection and my internet randomly goes down ever 6 hours or so? And I need to reset my internet connection to fix it which means I need to unplug my modem and router then plug them back in, and my IP is Changed So I need to portforward all over again! and I want to setup a static IP, So can anyone Help me find my DNS Servers?
